Package refactoringminer.api

Interface GitHistoryRefactoringMiner

All Known Implementing Classes:
GitHistoryRefactoringMinerImpl
public interface GitHistoryRefactoringMiner
Detect refactorings in the git history.

  • Method Details

    • detectAll

      void detectAll​(org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Repository repository, String branch, RefactoringHandler handler) throws Exception
      Iterate over each commit of a git repository and detect all refactorings performed in the entire repository history. Merge commits are ignored to avoid detecting the same refactoring multiple times.
      Parameters:
      repository - A git repository (from JGit library).
      branch - A branch to start the log lookup. If null, commits from all branches are analyzed.
      handler - A handler object that is responsible to process the detected refactorings and control when to skip a commit.
      Throws:
      Exception - propagated from JGit library.

    • detectBetweenTags

      void detectBetweenTags​(org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Repository repository, String startTag, String endTag, RefactoringHandler handler) throws Exception
      Iterate over commits between two release tags of a git repository and detect the performed refactorings.
      Parameters:
      repository - A git repository (from JGit library).
      startTag - An annotated tag to start the log lookup.
      endTag - An annotated tag to end the log lookup.
      handler - A handler object that is responsible to process the detected refactorings and control when to skip a commit.
      Throws:
      Exception - propagated from JGit library.

    • detectBetweenCommits

      void detectBetweenCommits​(org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Repository repository, String startCommitId, String endCommitId, RefactoringHandler handler) throws Exception
      Iterate over commits between two commits of a git repository and detect the performed refactorings.
      Parameters:
      repository - A git repository (from JGit library).
      startCommitId - The SHA key that identifies the commit to start the log lookup.
      endCommitId - The SHA key that identifies the commit to end the log lookup.
      handler - A handler object that is responsible to process the detected refactorings and control when to skip a commit.
      Throws:
      Exception - propagated from JGit library.

    • fetchAndDetectNew

      void fetchAndDetectNew​(org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Repository repository, RefactoringHandler handler) throws Exception
      Fetch new commits from the remote repo and detect all refactorings performed in these commits.
      Parameters:
      repository - A git repository (from JGit library).
      handler - A handler object that is responsible to process the detected refactorings and control when to skip a commit.
      Throws:
      Exception - propagated from JGit library.

    • detectAtCommit

      void detectAtCommit​(org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Repository repository, String commitId, RefactoringHandler handler)
      Detect refactorings performed in the specified commit.
      Parameters:
      repository - A git repository (from JGit library).
      commitId - The SHA key that identifies the commit.
      handler - A handler object that is responsible to process the detected refactorings.

    • detectAtCommit

      void detectAtCommit​(org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Repository repository, String commitId, RefactoringHandler handler, int timeout)
      Detect refactorings performed in the specified commit.
      Parameters:
      repository - A git repository (from JGit library).
      commitId - The SHA key that identifies the commit.
      handler - A handler object that is responsible to process the detected refactorings.
      timeout - A timeout, in seconds. When timeout is reached, the operation stops and returns no refactorings.

    • detectAtCommit

      void detectAtCommit​(String gitURL, String commitId, RefactoringHandler handler, int timeout)
      Detect refactorings performed in the specified commit. All required information is extracted using the GitHub API.
      Parameters:
      gitURL - The git URL of the repository.
      commitId - The SHA key that identifies the commit.
      handler - A handler object that is responsible to process the detected refactorings.
      timeout - A timeout, in seconds. When timeout is reached, the operation stops and returns no refactorings.

    • detectAtPullRequest

      void detectAtPullRequest​(String gitURL, int pullRequest, RefactoringHandler handler, int timeout) throws Exception
      Detect refactorings performed in the specified pull request. All required information is extracted using the GitHub API.
      Parameters:
      gitURL - The git URL of the repository.
      pullRequest - The pull request ID.
      handler - A handler object that is responsible to process the detected refactorings.
      timeout - A timeout, in seconds, per commit in the pull request. When timeout is reached, the operation stops and returns no refactorings.
      Throws:
      Exception - propagated from org.kohsuke.github API

    • churnAtCommit

      Churn churnAtCommit​(org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Repository repository, String commitId, RefactoringHandler handler)
      Detect refactorings performed in the specified commit.
      Parameters:
      repository - A git repository (from JGit library).
      commitId - The SHA key that identifies the commit.
      handler - A handler object that is responsible to process the detected refactorings.

    • getConfigId

      String getConfigId()
      Returns:
      An ID that represents the current configuration for the Refactoring Miner algorithm in use.
